npc_text.text: Hello!, who are you? I can't recognize your face. Hmmm...

option.text: I came here because of the king's announcement.
It's not your business wheather I'm here or not.

npc_text.text: Oh, so you want to fight The Monster? Good luck with it. Nobody could beat him. Lots of strangers came here but no one returned. Guess what happened to them...

option.text: Yes, I want and I'm going to. I'm not scared of that creature.
How much people are we talking about?

npc_text.text: Then I would suggest you to get some people that helps you.

option.text: Alright, thank you for the advice!

npc_text.text: Lots, uncountables.

option.text: I suppose I will accept the challenge
I'm not like the rest.

npc_text.text: Oh, I'm sorry... Anyways, you look a bit disappointing to solve the Kingdom's problem.

option.text: Whatever you say.
You look disappointing!

npc_text.text: Press enter to back
Don't talk to me, I'm really busy at the moment.

option.text: Ok, have a good day.

npc_text.text: Press enter to back
Hello Mr. How are you today?

option.text: I'm good, thank you. What about you?
I'm feeling nervous.

npc_text.text: I'm fine. I need to go and do some stuff. Will I see you later around here? And by the way, i heard that a hunter or something like that is coming to the town to fight The Monster. I can't wait to meet him!!

option.text: Hmm... Yeah yeah... Me too
I am that hunter you are talking about :)

npc_text.text: Why? Tell me.

option.text: Because I came here to kill The Monster and get the bounty.
Because I don't know where i can eat.

npc_text.text: WOOOOOOOOOOAAAH, THERE'S NO WAY, ARE YOU THE HUNTER?!? REALLY??!??! Can I shake your hand? Please.

option.text: Yes, why not.
No, I'm sorry.

npc_text.text: Well, if you want I can invite you to my house honey, I have food there. :3

option.text: Ahm, it would be great. You don't mind?
Ahm, no thank you... I will find something...

npc_text.text: Yeah, really, I don't mind.

option.text: Alright let's go.

npc_text.text: Press enter to back
The developers of this game told me they are suffering a lot with the main library. It's name is something like SDL or whatever. They told me they dislike it! It's too complicated!

option.text: It's normal, i feel them.
Well I don't think the same. SDL is cool.

npc_text.text: I know another library that is way easier to use and implement. It's called Rasmib, Raymib, Reylib... Whatever... Do you know the which one I am referring to?.

option.text: Hmmmmmmm... I don't know, no. Should I search for it?
Of course I do, it's called Raylib, and it is awesome!

npc_text.text: Eeeewww... I can't talk anymore with you after what you said. Bye.

option.text: Aaaaahhmm... Bye...

npc_text.text: Definitely, you should.

option.text: Ok, I will. Thank you. Bye

npc_text.text: That is awesome. The developer has been working a lot of years on it!

option.text: Really? Woah. It's incredible.

npc_text.text: Yes it is. Well, I gotta go, see you later! Glad to meet you!

option.text: Same, see you later!
